data.name: Secret of Sardinia
data.detailed_description:
Secret of Sardinia is an open-world adventure game full of mystery and mythology. It’s a combat-free fish experience with stealth elements and a focus on narrative. Swim, translate, listen, and explore!

Ancient Mythology

Locate magical bottles that contain the voices of departed souls, who speak their innermost thoughts as they live the last few days of their existence. Collect stone fragments to rebuild the Tablets of Ages – ancient writings which tell the forgotten lore of Sardinia. Closely examine the cryptic Tablets to translate its hieroglyphics and read its legends.

Fish-Fantasy

Control Sam the Sardine using a carefully-crafted swimming mechanic that lets you move with 360 degrees of freedom. Test your skills with races scattered throughout the ocean to attain union with the sea herself and unlock new abilities. Master these techniques to avoid the gaze of the unliving, lest you decay.

Open Seas

The Sotebol Expanse. The Giants’ Graveyard. The Caloksian Wasteland. The Undercurrent. Swim through four connected realms to find the answers you seek – and then travel beyond. Use your knowledge of the ancient Sardinian language to unlock the Cipher Stones, which open secret passageways all throughout the sea.

Features

  • Fluid and customizable swim controls
  • Four haunting realms to explore
  • Hand-drawn hieroglyphic language
  • Original fish-themed mythology
  • Philosophical narrative conveyed by compelling voice acting
  • Hundreds of hidden collectibles to uncover
  • Beautiful, original soundtrack

Copyright attribution for “Secret of Sardinia” can be found here.

data.short_description: Swim through a desolate underwater world to discover the truth of your lost civilization. As the last sardine in Sardinia, you must translate ancient fragments, listen to the voices of the dead, and rebuild a forgotten mythology as you uncover the deepest secrets of the sea.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5 3470 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 960 or equivalent
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 970 or equivalent
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro of equivalent
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro of equivalent
